MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Site_Title: UV Outliner - Simple and powerful outliner for Windows
Site.Site_Description_100: UV Outliner is a small and powerful application for creating, organizing, and collecting information
Site.Site_Description_250: UV Outliner is a small and powerful application for creating, organizing, and collecting information. With UV Outliner you can create plans, schedules, and to-do lists, collect and organize ideas, brainstorm, plan your trips and much more!
Site.Site_Description_450:
UV Outliner is a small and powerful application for creating, organizing, and collecting information.
With UV Outliner you can create plans, schedules, and to-do lists, collect and organize ideas, brainstorm, plan your trips, record meeting minutes, track expenses, write novels and much more.

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win2000,WinOther,Windows2000,Windows2003,Windows Vista Ultimate,Windows Vista Ultimate x64,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64
Program_Info.Limitations: UV Outliner is fully functional in trial mode. The only difference is a reminder window which will appear sometimes and remind you to purchase UV Outliner if you loved it.
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: *Each row in the outline can have multiple lines of a rich text. This means that you can format rows in the outline like in any word processor - specifying colors, font sizes, etc *Styles in UV Outliner allow you to specify, how to format rows in certain hierarchies *Your outline can be exported

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: The trial version of UV Outliner can be freely distributed over the internet in an unchaged form

English.Char_Desc_45: UV Outliner is for organizing information
English.Char_Desc_80: UV Outliner is for creating, organizing, and collecting information
English.Char_Desc_250: UV Outliner is a small and powerful application for creating, organizing, and collecting information.
English.Char_Desc_450: UV Outliner is a small and powerful application for creating, organizing, and collecting information. With UV Outliner you can create plans, schedules, and to-do lists, collect and organize ideas, brainstorm, plan your trips, record meeting minutes, track expenses, write novels and much more.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
UV Outliner is a small and powerful application for creating, organizing, and collecting information.
With UV Outliner you can create plans, schedules, and to-do lists, manage notes, collect and organize ideas, brainstorm, plan your trips, record meeting minutes, track expenses, write novels and much more.
In general, UV Outliner allows you to work with hierarchical information.
